title: Bayerische Staatsoper:  Das schlaue Fuchslein, Leos Janacek
description: Black poster with two large, orange stripes running vertically. In bottom half, same color as stripes, the back legs and tail of a wolf at right. Text at right in white reads: "Bayerisch Staatsoper/ Das schlau/ Fuchslein" with additional date and time information below.
name: Poster
